mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member(user_no, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_point, user_totalpoint) values(#{user_no}, #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_point}, #{user_totalpoint})
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_member
order by user_totalpoint desc)a) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from tbl_member where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
